args.natural_language_statement: Let {x_n}_{n=1}^\infty be a convergent monotone sequence of real numbers. Suppose there exists k : ‚Ñï such that lim_{n‚Üí‚àû} x_n = x_k. Show that x_n = x_k for all n ‚â• k. Translate to Lean4 (import Mathlib at top) and end the statement with := by sorry.

args.content:
import Mathlib

open Filter

/-- If a monotone sequence of real numbers converges to the value of one of its terms x_k,
    then the sequence is constant equal to x_k from index k onward. -/
theorem monotone_convergent_const_of_limit_eq_index {x : ‚Ñï ‚Üí ‚Ñù} {k : ‚Ñï}
  (hmono : Monotone x) (hconv : Tendsto x atTop (ùìù (x k))) :
  ‚àÄ n, n ‚â• k ‚Üí x n = x k := by sorry
